elements.description:
### Usage
    This is a helper component to support display of button on hover effect in px-tile and avoid duplicate code
    
    <px-action-buttons action-buttons="{{actionButtons}}"></px-action-buttons>
    
    If items <= 3 it will display the elements one after the other
    If items > 3 it will display the list of elements in a dropdown
    
    actionButtons is a JSON object such as: 
    E.g. for items = 3
    let actionButtons = {"items":[{"id":"1","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:phone"},{"id":"2","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:edit"}]};
    E.g for items > 3
    let actionButtons = {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Edit","icon":"px-utl:edit","selected":true},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","label":"Remove","icon":"px-vis:trash-series"},{"id":"4","label":"Notification","icon":"px-nav:notification"}],"sortMode":"id","buttonStyle":"icon","icon":"px-nav:more","displayValue":"Select","disabled":false,"disableClear":false,"hideChevron":true,"multi":false,"searchMode":false}
    
    See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design for button options 
    See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown for dropdown options

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description:
Action buttons to display below the description/copy text.
Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

properties.name: hoverTextColor
properties.description: Current text color of overlay to apply other elements when hovering

properties.name: isOverlay
properties.description: Boolean to find out if items list is in overlay

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Attach event listeners for dropdown action buttons.

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Detach event listeners for dropdown action buttons.

methods.name: _actionButtonsChanged
methods.description:
Observer when actionButtons changes.  
Sets flag _isDisplayDropdown true if actionButtons size is greater than default items size 3, false otherwise.
Sets flag _isDisplayButtons true if actionButtons size is less or equal than default items size 3, false otherwise.
If _isDisplayDropdown === true it will update px-dropdown options menu

methods.name: _onSelected
methods.description: Callback for on-tap event for action items when the list size is 3 or less

methods.name: _itemSelected
methods.description: Callback for selected/unselected action title dropdown items when the list is greater than 3

methods.name: _handleSelection
methods.description: Fires px-title-action with selection detail. E.g. {"id": "1", "label": "Favorite", "selected": true}

methods.name: _getBtnClazz
methods.description:
Return button class type and size if any
See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design for more details.

methods.name: _getBtnColor
methods.description: Return style for color.  This property is part of px-button so honor if passed on.

attributes.name: action-buttons
attributes.description:
Action buttons to display below the description/copy text.
Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

attributes.name: hover-text-color
attributes.description: Current text color of overlay to apply other elements when hovering

attributes.name: is-overlay
attributes.description: Boolean to find out if items list is in overlay

elements.description:
Px-tile tile can be customized with px theme, title, subtitle, description, buttons, imagery or px components. This also means that applications may choose to include or exclude any of these elements. It also provides actionable callback functionalities(text,button,icon e.g.) meaning developers may choose to utilize them to perform customizable actions based on user's input. Typically, Px-tile can be utilized for actions such as: contact cards, work orders, inspections, media tiles, or an overview of a device. ### Note There are two elements in which you can add content: `
` and `
`. Since these elements are used to display content you are responsible for styling, make sure the content follows the Predix guidelines. You can find an example demo under `demo/components-mix-demo.html` showing how to use these elements. ### Usage #### image-based thumbnail ```
Footer Content Here
 ``` #### px-chart-based thumbnail ```
Footer Content Here
 ``` ### Buttons and Dropdown reference https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown ### Styling The following custom properties are also available for styling: Custom property | Description | Default :----------------|:-------------|:---------- `--px-tile-width` | Width of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-height` | Height of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-width` | Width of the thumbnail portion | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-height` | Height of the thumbnail portion | `11.66667rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-background-color` | Background color of the thumbnail portion | `white` `--px-tile-background-color` | Background color of the tile | `lightgray` `--px-tile-about-min-height` | Height of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-width` | Width of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-padding` | Padding of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-right` | Right of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-bottom` | Bottom of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-text-background-color` | Background color of the the bottom bar of the tile | `lightgray` `--px-tile-title-color` | Text color for title in the bottom bar | `darkslategray` `--px-tile-subtitle-color` | Text color for subtitle in the bottom bar | `gray` `--px-tile-text-color` | Text color for the description text in the bottom bar | `darkslategray` `--px-tile-action-buttons-position` | Position of action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-action-buttons-right` | Right position of action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-action-buttons-bottom` | Bottom position of action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-desc-line-height` | Line Height of overlay description text | `1rem` `--px-tile-overlay-desc-font-size` | Font Size of overlay description text | `0.8rem` `--px-tile-overlay-background-color` | Background color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `black` `--px-tile-overlay-text-color` | Text color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `white` `--px-tile-overlay-action-buttons-position` | Position of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-action-buttons-bottom` | Bottom position of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-action-buttons-right` | Right position of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-width` | Width of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-desc-text-height` | Multi-line truncation effect for description text with the specified rem value | `2rem` `--px-tile-text-height` | Height of the about section (bottom section) | `8.333rem`

properties.name: hoverable
properties.description:
If true, hovering over the card will cause an overlay to appear
with more detailed information, including the description
and an optional slot for showing a footer at the bottom.

properties.name: _hovered
properties.description: Whether the tile is currently being hovered.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Main text label for the tile.

properties.name: description
properties.description:
Description information to be displayed underneath tile and subtitle.
Default : Only the first ~3 lines of text will be displayed, after which it will be truncated.
You can customize this using by adjusting `--px-tile-desc-text-height` SASS variable. (e.g. 1 line = 1 rem,
to set to 5 lines truncated, set --px-tile-desc-text-height : 5rem)

properties.name: overlayDescription
properties.description:
Description information to be displayed in the overlay of a hoverable card.
It has more space to display text content and can be adjusted along with
total height of the tile.

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description:
Action buttons display below description.

When items <= 3 will display the buttons/text inline.

Please refer to ` px-buttons-design ` (https://www.predix-ui.com/#/css/visual/buttons/px-buttons-design) for more details

When items > 3 will display the list of elements in a dropdown.

Please refer to ` px-dropdown ` (https://www.predix-ui.com/#/elements/px-dropdown) for more details

 `style` is an additionally property from px-tile (E.g. background-color: red; margin-left: 4px; others..). See example "Buttons with text only" below

Some examples when items <= 3:

Only icons:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","size":"small","type":"bare","buttonIcon":true,"icon":"px-utl:link"},{"id":"2","size":"small","type":"bare","buttonIcon":true,"icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","size":"small","type":"bare","buttonIcon":true,"icon":"px-utl:download"}]} ` 

Small buttons:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Link","size":"small"},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","size":"small"},{"id":"3","label":"Download","size":"small"}]} ` 

Small buttons with icons:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Link","size":"small","icon":"px-utl:link"},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","size":"small","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","label":"Download","size":"small","icon":"px-utl:download"}]} ` 

Buttons with text only:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Link","size":"small","type":"bare--primary", "style":"margin-right: -15px;"},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","size":"small","type":"bare--primary"},{"id":"3","label":"Download","size":"small","type":"bare--primary"}]} ` 



Example when items > 3:  

` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Edit","icon":"px-utl:edit","selected":true},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","label":"Remove","icon":"px-vis:trash-series"},{"id":"4","label":"Notification","icon":"px-nav:notification"}],"sortMode":"id","buttonStyle":"icon","icon":"px-nav:more","displayValue":"Select","disabled":false,"disableClear":false,"hideChevron":true,"multi":false,"searchMode":false} ` 

Event fired on item selection:

`px-tile-action-tapped`

methods.name: _hover
methods.description: Method used internally for flipping the hovered status of a tile.

methods.name: _hoverableChanged
methods.description: On change callback to remove overlay

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Attach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Detach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: _getClass
methods.description: Returns class to control overlay for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: _onDataChanged
methods.description: On change callback for either property to set flags to either show/hide elements on px-tile

attributes.name: hoverable
attributes.description:
If true, hovering over the card will cause an overlay to appear
with more detailed information, including the description
and an optional slot for showing a footer at the bottom.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Main text label for the tile.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description:
Description information to be displayed underneath tile and subtitle.
Default : Only the first ~3 lines of text will be displayed, after which it will be truncated.
You can customize this using by adjusting `--px-tile-desc-text-height` SASS variable. (e.g. 1 line = 1 rem,
to set to 5 lines truncated, set --px-tile-desc-text-height : 5rem)

attributes.name: overlay-description
attributes.description:
Description information to be displayed in the overlay of a hoverable card.
It has more space to display text content and can be adjusted along with
total height of the tile.

attributes.name: action-buttons
attributes.description:
Action buttons display below description.

When items <= 3 will display the buttons/text inline.

Please refer to ` px-buttons-design ` (https://www.predix-ui.com/#/css/visual/buttons/px-buttons-design) for more details

When items > 3 will display the list of elements in a dropdown.

Please refer to ` px-dropdown ` (https://www.predix-ui.com/#/elements/px-dropdown) for more details

 `style` is an additionally property from px-tile (E.g. background-color: red; margin-left: 4px; others..). See example "Buttons with text only" below

Some examples when items <= 3:

Only icons:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","size":"small","type":"bare","buttonIcon":true,"icon":"px-utl:link"},{"id":"2","size":"small","type":"bare","buttonIcon":true,"icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","size":"small","type":"bare","buttonIcon":true,"icon":"px-utl:download"}]} ` 

Small buttons:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Link","size":"small"},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","size":"small"},{"id":"3","label":"Download","size":"small"}]} ` 

Small buttons with icons:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Link","size":"small","icon":"px-utl:link"},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","size":"small","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","label":"Download","size":"small","icon":"px-utl:download"}]} ` 

Buttons with text only:  ` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Link","size":"small","type":"bare--primary", "style":"margin-right: -15px;"},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","size":"small","type":"bare--primary"},{"id":"3","label":"Download","size":"small","type":"bare--primary"}]} ` 



Example when items > 3:  

` {"items":[{"id":"1","label":"Edit","icon":"px-utl:edit","selected":true},{"id":"2","label":"Copy","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"id":"3","label":"Remove","icon":"px-vis:trash-series"},{"id":"4","label":"Notification","icon":"px-nav:notification"}],"sortMode":"id","buttonStyle":"icon","icon":"px-nav:more","displayValue":"Select","disabled":false,"disableClear":false,"hideChevron":true,"multi":false,"searchMode":false} ` 

Event fired on item selection:

`px-tile-action-tapped`

events.name: px-tile-action-tapped
events.description:
px-tile-action-tapped  

Event ` px-tile-action-tapped ` is fired when an item is selected from actionButtons.items with selection detail. E.g. {"id": "1", "label": "Favorite"}

Example:
 
` window.addEventListener('px-tile-action-tapped', function(evt){ ` 

`    console.log(evt.detail); ` 

` }); `
